name: MELD
description: The Meld Network is one of the key pieces of the MELD protocol. It supports the smart contracts and operations of the financial products developed by MELD in a composable, interoperable way.

chains.name: meld
chains.description: The Meld Subnet is one of the key pieces of the MELD protocol. It supports the smart contracts and operations of the financial products developed by MELD in a composable, interoperable way.
